answers.answer: Eye Floaters:  I have a terrible problems with numerous eye floaters.  My left eye must have around 20 clumps with the right eye nearing the same total. The floaters appear in all shapes and sizes from dark spots to onion like patches floating across my field of vision.  The floaters are now getting into difficult to avoid, especially when reading and if I am sitting in a room with light colored walls.  Despite my best efforts to try and not concentate on them, I find myself in a loosing battle.Has anyone had surgery to remove the viterous gel and what was your experience?ThanksAlex
